channel.title: Shops help
channel.description:
i changed my home tele to somewear else and i want to bring shops there to :) i would think moveing shops would be really easy jsut change the pos
but i have some customs that are not in the shops and i want to make a new shop at staffzone for it? (i want a new shop with my customs)
my server is 317
help meh out?

item.title: Shops help
item.dc:creator: @buckybkatt buckybkatt
item.description:
@buckybkatt wrote:

In autospawn.cfg

Find the shop’s NPC and then find that NPC’s ID in npc.cfg and then, go to autospawn.cfg and search for his ID.

Once you find his ID in autospawn.cfg, switch the coords to what ever you like

Read full topic

In shops.cfg do you have any un-used shops?? If you do, that would be great
